Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
GenAI tends to be non-specific
Teacher/supervisor is able to talk through in detail what needs to change / why

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher/supervisor feedback is more specific so I leave feeling confident in how to fix my work

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response:
My supervisor knows me as a person, so even if I can't articulate the help I need for my assignment/work, they are able to describe in a way that helps me

GenAI is non-specific and general, and doesn't always pick up nuances
